item_info.name: Rank 2 Sorcerer Book
item_info.internalNotes: Read this to learn the secrets of being a Rank 2 Sorcerer!

skills.name: Secrets of a Sorcerer 2
skills.full_description: Read this book to learn the secrets of a Rank 2 Sorcerer and unlock an Imagination Point!

preconditions.248: You must be Level 10 or greater to use this item.
preconditions.123: Use the Rank 1 Sorcerer book before doing that.
preconditions.38: You need to be a member of Paradox to use this.

missions.mission_description: Equip all 4 pieces of the Rank 1 Sorcerer gear.
